comment: Mini Mike Bloomberg is spending a lot of money on False Advertising . I was the person who saved Pre-Existing Conditions in your Healthcare , you have it now , while at the same time winning the fight to rid you of the expensive , unfair and very unpopular Individual Mandate ...
amr:
# ::snt Mini Mike Bloomberg is spending a lot of money on False Advertising . I was the person who saved Pre-Existing Conditions in your Healthcare , you have it now , while at the same time winning the fight to rid you of the expensive , unfair and very unpopular Individual Mandate ...
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / spend-01

                        :op1 "Mike"
                        :op2 "Bloomberg")
                  :mod (m2 / mini))
            :ARG1 (a / advertise-01
                  :mod (f / false))
            :ARG3 (m3 / money
                  :quant (l / lot)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (s2 / save-02
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (c2 / condition
                        :ARG1-of (p2 / preexist-01)
                        :prep-in (h / healthcare
                              :poss (y / you))))
            :ARG2 (h2 / have-03
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 c2
                  :time (n2 / now)))
      :ARG2 (w / win-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (f2 / fight-01
                  :ARG2 (r / rid-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (m4 / mandate
                              :mod (ii2 / individual)
                              :mod (e / expensive)
                              :ARG1-of (f3 / fair-01
                                    :polarity -)
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / popular-02
                                    :polarity -
                                    :degree (v / very)))))
            :time (t / time
                  :ARG1-of (s3 / same-01))))
